description:
•	By using this app you can search any drugs information, disease information or any medical terms.
•	By using this app to find out all medical related information and its complete details like Title, shot cut name, organization name, group name, short description and Full description for search details.
•	This app getting the information from the Medline and MedlinePlus. So you can trust the data. And IA is very thank full to Medline for providing good results.
•	The search results are very accurate.
•	This app is suits for all whom dealing with medicine, doctors, students and ordinary people.
•	Online Medical Guide will allow you to search all medical related information.
*     This app will allow you to share information to your doctor or classmate or dearest ones.
